Для этого нужно зарегистрироваться на бирже, где продаются биткойны, и перевести туда средства для конвертации в Bitcoin Cash. Bitcoin Cash будут перечислены вам после обмена. Второй способ — найти компанию, в которой вы будете получать Bitcoin Cash за работу, или принимать эту валюту в качестве оплаты за товары или услуги (например, вы можете организовать продажу футболок за Bitcoin Cash).
ru_RU.1vkGpF: Как найти Bitcoin Cash в моем регионе?
ru_RU.14t6rJ: In many cities there is a market of Over The Counter (OTC) traders who trade fiat (such as USD, Yen, Euro, etc) for Bitcoin Cash. Or consider asking your employer if they would be willing to be at the forefront of the future of money and offer partial or complete payment in Bitcoin Cash. Some larger cities are also equipped with a Bitcoin Cash enabled ATM machine which make it very easy to trade in fiat for Bitcoin Cash. Ask at your nearest {=Bitcoin Cash Meetup} about other options, or consider visiting restaurants in your city where you can {=spend Bitcoin Cash} and enquire there.
ru_RU.4fj6y3: Покупка Bitcoin Cash онлайн — один из самых популярных способов приобретения этой валюты. Вы можете перевести деньги в местной валюте на онлайн-биржу, чтобы обменять их на Bitcoin Cash. ru_RU.4x4Fes: Отличается ли Bitcoin Cash от Bitcoin?
ru_RU.3CfwH4: В 2017 году сообщество разделилось и возникло альтернативное направление — Bitcoin Cash. Валюты получили разные биржевые символы — BTC и BCH. Приверженцы Bitcoin Cash, обозначаемой как BCH, считают, что именно эта валюта стала воплощением первоначальной идеи биткойна как пиринговой цифровой валюты.
ru_RU.1F3VdQ: Перевод денег в любую точку мира с минимальной комиссией
ru_RU.uTKwN: Благодаря Bitcoin Cash вы можете отправлять деньги любому человеку, в любую точку мира, в любое время суток и в любой день недели. Наша сеть работает всегда, как интернет. Объем транзакции не ограничен. Вам не потребуется никакое разрешение.

ru_RU.mdJVL: Обновления основаны не на определенной высоте блока, а на временной отметке. Это позволит вашей компании подготовиться к обновлению в определенное время, плюс или минус несколько часов.

tr_TR.1m65gv: Splitting the bill? Send money to your friend's wallet or have them send it to yours instead. Payments are fast and go directly between the two of you—no banks needed.
tr_TR.31jsRz: Store savings in a safer place

tr_TR.1cqDVr: No matter how much you send, fees are always tiny.

tr_TR.NzxX0: The goal for Bitcoin Cash is to become sound money that is usable by everyone in the world. This is a civilization-changing technology which will dramatically increase human freedom and prosperity.
tr_TR.2xz1tO: This roadmap is intended to provide high-level technical direction, and enable different technical teams to work together towards a common goal for advancing Bitcoin Cash. The role of developers in furth ering this goal is to produce high-quality professional software that serves the needs of its users, miners and merchants. We strive for continuous technical improvement, to produce reliable products providing a solid foundation for Bitcoin Cash.
tr_TR.2u3To0: The basic design of Bitcoin Cash is sound. However, this does not mean it is perfect. It is prudent to make incremental improvements to the system with technically sound design and careful engineering. By implementing optimizations and protocol upgrades, peer-to-peer digital cash will scale many orders of magnitude beyond current limits.
tr_TR.30Hzlu: The needed technical improvements can be divided into three categories:
tr_TR.WN3iT: Enable Bitcoin Cash to scale from ~100 Tx/s to over 5,000,000 Tx/s. Protocol improvements must be made so that mass-parallelization can enable this level of transaction processing.
tr_TR.3svlWD: Improving the payment experience to ensure that it is instant and reliable. Transactions should be secure within three seconds.
tr_TR.q69ZY: Make Bitcoin Cash extensible. An extensible protocol makes future improvements less disruptive, and provides a solid base for businesses and developers to build on.
tr_TR.1YkBQG: The Bitcoin Cash network has protocol upgrades twice a year, on November 15th and May 15th. These upgrades are required for all node operators. They are sometimes referred to as "hard fork upgrades", but the term "scheduled protocol upgrades" is preferred.
tr_TR.mdJVL: Rather than a specific block height, the upgrades are based on a timestamp. When the median timestamp of the most recent 11 blocks (MTP-11) is greater than or equal to UNIX timestamp of November 15th (or May 15th) 12:00:00 UTC, the new protocol rules take effect. This better enables your business to prepare for the upgrade at a particular estimated time, plus or minus a few hours.
tr_TR.1vCcB6: Although this semi-annual upgrade schedule is not expected to continue forever, it is in place for the forseeable near-term future. Regular protocol upgrades provide a predictable cadence for the ecosystem, and are necessary to achieve the vision set forth in the roadmap.
tr_TR.3m1Olg: To become a solid base for application development and innovation, Bitcoin Cash must continuously improve and compete. Working together, we can build a technical foundation to empower Bitcoin Cash to be the best money the world has ever seen.

zh_CN.eMRSc: 购买或挣得比特币现金
zh_CN.vAuOo: 获得比特币现金的两种最简单的方法是购买或赚取。 购买是最常用、最便捷的方式，你只需要在比特币交易所注册并存入资金，即可转换为比特币现金。交易完成后，交易所将向你发送比特币现金。另一种选择是通过工作赚取。例如，在工作平台上找一份以比特币现金支付的工作，或者可以创建你自己的服务（比如卖T恤）来赚取比特币现金。
zh_CN.1vkGpF: 本地哪里有比特币现金？
zh_CN.14t6rJ: 很多城市都有场外交易市场（OTC），交易员用比特币现金交易法币（如美元、日元、欧元等）。或者你可以考虑问你的雇主是否愿意站在未来货币的最前沿，使用比特币现金支付部分或全部酬劳。一些较大的城市也配备了支持比特币现金的ATM机，这使得购买比特币现金变得非常容易。在离你最近的比 {=Bitcoin Cash Meetup} 下聚会询问其他选项，或者去你所在城市可以消费比 {=spend Bitcoin Cash} 的餐馆，在那里问问。
zh_CN.3kXOhE: 能在线上购买比特币现金吗？
zh_CN.4fj6y3: 线上购买比特币现金是最常用的比特币现金接收方式。您可以通过买卖本地货币与数字加密货币的线上交易所进行银行转账，实现比特币现金交易。有些交易所甚至接受信用卡即时购买。与任何线上购物一样，您要自己研究，一定要有自己的钱包。我们不建议在交易所账户中存放任何比特币现金。一定要将比特币现金存放在您自己的，经过安全备份的钱包里。

zh_CN.uTKwN: 有了比特币现金，您可以每年365天，每天24小时向全球各地的任何人汇款。与互联网一样，比特币现金网络全年无休。交易金额不分大小，再也不需要任何人授权或批准了。
zh_CN.3d3uCY: 您就是自己的银行，完全掌控自己的钱
zh_CN.1QpcTO: 塞浦路斯（差不多还有希腊）发生过账户持有人资金被扣留的事件（“保释”），表明银行存款的安危完全系于政治领袖的决定。即使是最理想的状况，银行也可能出错，扣留资金，冻结账户，或者让您无法接触自己的资金。
zh_CN.3EvEtO: 银行也可能决定阻止您的交易，向您收费，或未经事先警告而关闭您的账户。比特币现金让您完全掌控自己的资金，自己当家做主，您可以在全球的任何角落查看自己的资金。

zh_CN.1BGneB: 提升您的私密性和操作匿名性

zh_CN.3BAZ51: 支持全球范围内的资金自由流动

zh_CN.3dzOlj: 一笔比特币现金交易的网络费用普遍少于一美分。如果你通过商户处理器将比特币现金换成诸如美元之类的法币，手续费甚至比使用信用卡的费用还低很多。

zh_CN.1MWejd: 越来越多的顾客选择比特币现金为首选的支付方式。他们青睐那些提供这种付款方式的商家，到处寻找这种商家。

zh_CN.NzxX0: 比特币现金的目标是成为世界上每个人都可以使用的可靠资金。 这是一项改变文明的技术，将大大提升人类的自由和繁荣程度。
zh_CN.2xz1tO: 本路线图旨在提供高级技术指导，并使不同的技术团队能够协力推动比特币现金的共同目标。 开发人员在实现这一目标的职责是，产出高质量的、专业程度高的软件，以满足其用户、矿工和商家的需求。 我们致力于持续的技术改进，以产出可靠的产品，为比特币现金的发展提供坚实基础。
zh_CN.2u3To0: 比特币现金的基本设计是合理的。 但是，这并不意味着它是完美的。 稳健的做法是，通过技术合理的设计和精心的工程实现，对系统逐步改进。 通过不断实现优化和协议升级，点对点数字现金的应用规模，将扩展至超出当前规模许多个数量级。
zh_CN.30Hzlu: 必要的技术改进可分为三类：
zh_CN.WN3iT: 使比特币现金可以从约100 Tx / s扩展到超过5,000,000 Tx / s。必须进行协议改进，以便这一规模交易处理实现大规模并行化。
zh_CN.3svlWD: 改善支付体验，确保其即时、可靠。 交易应在三秒钟内完成验证。
zh_CN.q69ZY: 使比特币现金可扩展。 可扩展的协议使未来的改进不那么具有破坏性，并为企业和开发人员提供了坚实的基础。
zh_CN.1YkBQG: 比特币现金网络每年进行两次协议升级，分别在11月15日和5月15日。所有的节点运营者必须进行升级。有时，这些升级被称作“硬分叉升级”；但“常规协议升级”这种叫法更为准确。
zh_CN.mdJVL: 升级的判定依据是时间戳，而不是特定的区块高度。当最新的11个区块的时间戳中位数(MTP-11)大于或等于世界标准时间11月15日（或5月15日）12:00:00的UNIX时间戳时，新协议规则将生效。您可以按此时间更好地根据业务需要做相应准备，比如预先或延后几小时做出调整。
zh_CN.1vCcB6: 尽管这半年一次的升级计划不会永远持续下去，但在可预期的近期内会照此执行。定期的协议升级为生态系统提供了可预测的节奏，对于实现路线图中的愿景也是必需的。
zh_CN.3m1Olg: 要成为应用程序开发和创新的坚实基础，比特币现金必须不断改进和竞争。通过合作，我们可以建立一个技术基础平台，使比特币现金成为世界上有史以来最好的货币。

zh_TW.2CdpUR: Money built for you, not banks
zh_TW.2C7QC2: Bitcoin Cash makes money work for you. Pay people fast, send money abroad basically for free, and store savings securely—all without middlemen controlling your funds.
zh_TW.3bJF4s: Coffee to go? Time for a new laptop? Get it with Bitcoin Cash at an increasing number of participating websites and stores. Simply scan to check out, just like Google Pay.
zh_TW.3SfaRA: Send money abroad basically for free
zh_TW.29O6Jz: On average, banks take a 6.8% cut out of the money you send home. Bitcoin Cash is much cheaper—and faster, too. Use it to send remittances for less than a cent.
zh_TW.3SN5n9: Pay with the privacy of cash
zh_TW.2YvhRY: Since a bank account is tied to your identity, your transaction history is, too. Bitcoin Cash is the opposite: nobody knows who you are and payments can be sent privately.
zh_TW.3m6uDG: Pay online without a bank account
zh_TW.20ncQp: Too far away? Too many fees? Whatever your reason for not owning a bank account, Bitcoin Cash can help. Use it to pay and get paid online without the need for banks.
zh_TW.1m65gv: Splitting the bill? Send money to your friend's wallet or have them send it to yours instead. Payments are fast and go directly between the two of you—no banks needed.
zh_TW.31jsRz: Store savings in a safer place
zh_TW.3fvel5: Scammers can pretend to be your bank, using scare tactics to trick you into sending them money. Bitcoin Cash fixes this trust issue by removing third parties altogether.
zh_TW.2LV9oT: Bitcoin Cash does what banks can't do
zh_TW.3bZEuY: Payments go directly from one person to another.
zh_TW.1cqDVr: No matter how much you send, fees are always tiny.
zh_TW.wcVx5: Money is sent and received fast—no delays, no limits.
zh_TW.2odNPk: And everyone, everywhere can use it
zh_TW.1c7j6u: Bitcoin Cash is sound money for the world. To meet growing demand, developers are always scaling the Bitcoin Cash network.
